short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lets you take control of your time by limiting Instagram features

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With this extension you can remove Reels, the explore page, apply grayscale cross website, and even make your inbox the only page you can access on a browser. This gives you the ability to control your time on Instagram by removing distracting features or by turning it into a messenger.
